    • Constructor Detail

      • PuddleMDP

        public PuddleMDP(int size)
        Creates a Puddle MDP with the default locations for the lake position and directions. The environment will be a grid of 'size by size', parameter provided
        Parameters:
        size - : the with and height of the squared environment
